s: Amazon.com: Modern Battery Technology (Ellis Horwood Series in Applied Science and Industrial Technology): 9780135902660: Tuck, Clive D. S.: Books
According to the Amazon website, AmazonBasics AA Batteries are made in Indonesia using Japanese technology, and their rechargeable AA batteries are manufactured in Japan.
